header.title: Insight: Racism in Football
header.subtitle: NA
header.postText: Football is still plagued by racism and the world's most popular sport is failing to curb racist abuse despite long-standing campaigns.  . .                               . . Subscribe: http://trt.world/subscribe. . . . Livestream: http://trt.world/ytlive. . . . Facebook: http://trt.world/facebook. . . . Twitter: http://trt.world/twitter. . . . Instagram: http://trt.world/instagram. . . . Visit our website: http://trt.world
